subject: John
object: the rumors spreading around the office
sentence: John believed the rumors spreading around the office.
paragraph: John was known for being somewhat gullible in the workplace. Every time a new rumor emerged, he would latch onto it. John believed the rumors spreading around the office. But many of his colleagues remained skeptical. Eventually, the truth came out and the rumors were debunked.

subject: Mark

subject: Lucy

subject: Jack
